meanings.definition: A bitter crystalline compound obtained from the seeds of the Anamirta cocculus plant, used as a central nervous system stimulant.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of picrotoxin on the brain cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes prescribe picrotoxin to help patients with certain brain conditions.
meanings.sent3: The bitter taste of picrotoxin made the researchers cringe during the experiment.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like picrotoxin, stimulating his mind to think more clearly.
meanings.sent5: The image of picrotoxin under the microscope was fascinating to the students.

meanings.definition: Toxin derived from the seeds of the Anamirta cocculus plant, causing convulsions and other symptoms when ingested.
meanings.sent1: The poison control center identified the symptoms of picrotoxin poisoning.
meanings.sent2: Ingesting picrotoxin can lead to serious health issues.
meanings.sent3: The villain tried to use picrotoxin to create chaos in the city.
meanings.sent4: The effects of his betrayal were like picrotoxin, causing turmoil in her life.
meanings.sent5: The danger of picrotoxin consumption was emphasized in the health class.
